tossup_question: 23) BIOLOGY  What specialized plant cells are responsible for the opening and closing of stomatal airways in response to water stress?
bonus_question: 23) BIOLOGY  Which of the following glands contributes to thermoregulation by adjusting the resting metabolic rate?
bonus_MCQoptions:

X) Thyroid
